arStrings.szText: Casting {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} also launches {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} in all directions, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Essence per enemy hit.

Casting {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} also launches {c_important}Bone Splinters{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Essence per enemy hit.
